events.name: HolidayJS 2012
events.about: HolidayJS is a full-day JavaScript and Node.js-focused event starting with great talks from community leaders in the morning, a catered lunch and a JavaScript Hackathon in the afternoon with prizes and gifts for hackathon winners and attendees!

events.name: Quick & Dirty Hackathon
events.about:
The Startup Bus is heading over to Gangplank Chandler! In celebration of these brave souls seeking to build a business in 72-hours while hurtling across the barren desert towards promise of parties and funding at SXSW, Gangplank Chandler will be hosting a good ole fashion Hackathon.

The theme of the Hackathon is Conference Engagement. Teams are tasked with designing a web or mobile app around the conference experience. Ideas include:

  • Session bingo
  • Scheduling/Location assistance apps
  • Party Spotter
  • Conference hookups
  • Whatever else you can think up

Participants must have a working prototype and be ready to pitch by midnight. Well keep you moving with food, Red Bull and beer.

Prizes will be awarded to the top 3 apps.

Already got your own thing? Join in! Come work around the energy and occasionally try to distract the hackers as they work furiously on their apps.
